attributes.title: Terrible app!
attributes.review: I downloaded this app to find a reason to vote for him and the fact that he haven’t done any of the things he said he would does not give me high hopes. He even doubled the national debt. This app took for ever to install and by that I mean about 50 minutes and my other apps take about 1-2 minutes to install. This app is glitchy, useless, and should be taken off the app stores.

attributes.title: Horrible app
attributes.review: I got the app to see if it could show me any of trumps plans or redeeming qualities, but every time I tried to open it it would crash. One time it worked, however, it was not very informative and very confusing to use. I’m giving it a 1 star because I was trying to understand his side and policies but I wasn’t even able to because of how terrible this app was.

attributes.title: If I could give it zero stars I would❤️
attributes.review: If you didn’t know my name is Karen. I have a career in reviewing apps that could potentially change the world and how it works. When it comes to this app...let’s just say no❤️. This app is horrible it doesn’t work and what it stands for is completely ludacris. Personally, I would like it better if the person this app was representing was changed to manny from diary of a wimpy kid.

attributes.title: Please don’t download
attributes.review: This app is not one I would suggest. When I downloaded it, first off, it took like three hours to download, and it was super glitchy. It kept freezing and kicking me out of the app. Now I just wanted to see what this app was about cause I’ve heard people talking about it, but I want to tell you guys that it is not worth it. Please don’t waste your time downloading this app, it’s not worth it.
